```{r}
library(GGally)
library(ggplot2)
library(mctest)
library(olsrr)

plot_ggpairs <- function(data) {
  ggpairs(
    data,
    lower = list(
      continuous = wrap("smooth", method = "loess", color = "red"),
      combo = "facethist",
      discrete = "facetbar",
      na = "na"
    ),
    upper = list(
      continuous = "cor"
    ),
    diag = list(
      continuous = "densityDiag"
    )
  ) +
    theme_bw()
}
```
